se.kvirkel.tankwars.game

Class TWGameServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.kvirkel.tankwars.game.TWGameServer

  • public class TWGameServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Game server class. Handles almost every game calculations based on the NetworkServer input.
    Author:
    Ludwig, Peter, Simon
